roleset.name: to deprive an organ of attached nerves
roleset.note: DENERVATION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-enervate.01. (from denervation.01-n)

example.name: denervate-v
example.text: We have partially denervated the mouse soleus muscle just after birth by cutting one (L5) ofthe two (L4 and L 5) spinal nerves which supply its innervation.
example.arg: by cutting one (L5) ofthe two (L4 and L 5) spinal nerves which supply its innervation

example.name: denervation-n
example.text: To avoid an undesired denervation of other structures, the knowledge of the specific innervation of the joint is essential.
